reviewText: This video ranks high on the goofy chart. The routine itself bordered on ridiculous. I can say that I got nothing at all out of this. If you are serious about yoga I would say skip this one; it's a total waste of money.

Grade A, Superb!  If you want a yoga/tantra class that teaches you how to connect with mind, body, and soul this is it.  You will learn how to use your pc muscles with yoga poses, breathing, touch, and visualization to create, build, and move sexual energy through the body.
